channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump calls Charlie Kirk, 'a martyr,' one of 'America's greatest patriots'
item.description: President Trump declared Charlie Kirk "one of America's greatest patriots," heaping lavish praise on the slain conservative activist, who was assassin...

item.title: South Korean President Lee raises concerns about U.S. investment demand
item.description: South Korean President Lee Jae-myung says his country could face a financial crisis if it accepts the Trump administration's investment demands withou...

item.title: Erika Kirk says she forgives husband's assassin
item.description: In a stunning moment, the widow of slain conservative activist Charlie Kirk said at his funeral that she forgives her husband's assassin.

item.title: Trump to honor allies, award Ben Carson with the Presidential Medal of Freedom
item.description: President Trump announced Saturday that he will award Ben Carson the Presidential Medal of Freedom, the nation's highest civilian honor.

item.title: Colleges hustle to adapt as Trump administration reshapes higher education
item.description: Colleges nationwide are scrambling to adjust to the Trump administration's overhaul of higher education as the fall semester has kicked into gear, and...

item.title: They Never Learn: Chicagoland Sanctuary Politicians Continue to Sabotage the Rule of Law
item.description: As ICE steps up enforcement in Chicago and its suburbs, sanctuary politicians are once again attempting to sabotage the rule of law and protect illega...

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Wu Woos Illegal Aliens in Boston
item.description: For Boston Mayor Michelle Wu, protecting illegal aliens takes priority over defending her city against a federal lawsuit, compromising much-needed fed...

item.title: Over 3 Million People Sign Leniency Petition for Illegal Alien Charged with Killing Three Florida Motorists
item.description: Over 3 million people have signed a petition demanding leniency for Harjinder Singh, the illegal alien truck driver accused of causing a horrific cras...

item.title: Third Military Buffer Zone Established Along U.S.-Mexico Border in Arizona
item.description: The “Yuma National Defense Area” at the southern border in Arizona allows the military to support the Trump administration’s whole-of-government appro...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
